verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Majesty, worship His majesty Unto Jesus be all glory, honor, and praise. Majesty, kingdom authority Flow from His throne, unto His own, His anthem raise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So exalt, lift up on high the name of Jesus. Magnify, come glorify Christ Jesus the King.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
